name: Soccer Crush
description:
Crush the Soccer in this amazing Android game. Get ready to become the best Soccer Player in the world. In order to do that, you will have to overcome different challenges throughout Brazil. Have fun in the World Cup Stadiums featured in this game. Get ready for the ultimate soccer matching challenge!
Soccer Crush is the classic matching game where you need to match at least 3 similar Soccer Items to score points. Not everything is classic though. In Soccer Crush you can match Items with diagonal moves too!
Start playing this amazing Soccer game now!

Features:

- Over 80 challenging levels.
- Diagonal moves included.
- Great Artwork.
- Nice music.
- In app purchase.
